meaningMnemonic: You take a <radical>turkey</radical> and try to <radical>boil</radical> it but you <kanji>char</kanji> it instead. That's what happens when you throw meat into a pot on high with no water in there.
readingMnemonic: You're staring sadly at the <kanji>char</kanji>red turkey when you suddenly sense the <reading>Shou</reading>gun (しょう) looming behind you. You were supposed to be cooking this turkey for him and now he looks really, really mad.
